checks.name: consent
checks.notes: Consent appears before sensitive items and includes purpose and retention.

checks.name: data_minimization
checks.notes: No name collected; items limited to stated purpose.

checks.name: purpose_and_retention
checks.notes: Retention is concrete and deletion implied.

checks.name: medical_disclaimer
checks.notes: Add explicit not-a-diagnosis language near results screen.

checks.name: privacy_and_security
checks.notes: De-identified storage and role-based access declared.

checks.name: auditability
checks.notes: Define which events are logged and where logs are stored.
